title: WTB TCS Tubeless Tire Sealant is Back with New Ammonia-Free Synthetic Latex Formula
content:
It’s been five years since WTB has offered their own tire sealant, but TCS is back! More importantly, this isn’t just another rebranded sealant in a new bottle. WTB claims that they’ve spent the past two years developing their own formula that will stand out against the sea of leak-plugging liquids. According to WTB, their

The post WTB TCS Tubeless Tire Sealant is Back with New Ammonia-Free Synthetic Latex Formula appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
